name: The Moldy Peaches
description: '''The Moldy Peaches''' are an American [[independent music|indie group]] founded by [[Adam Green (musician)|Adam Green]] and [[Kimya Dawson]]. Leading proponents of the [[anti-folk]] scene, the band had been on [[Recess (break)|hiatus]] since 2004, but in 2023 announced on [[Twitter]] that they would be reuniting. The appearance of their song "[[Anyone Else but You]]" in the film ''[[Juno (film)|Juno]]'' significantly raised their profile; Dawson and Green made a handful of reunion appearances together in December 2007.
